snippet: Doctors are pleased that the dangers of concussions are receiving more attention, but they often see overreactions from parents alarmed by high-profile cases.
abstract: Dozens of youth concussion clinics have opened nationwide as parents and student athletes seek treatment for condition that has received widespread attention in media and professional sports; doctors warn that while cautious approach is healthy, research and treatment into effects of concussions on young people remains in its infancy.
lead_paragraph: Doctors are pleased that the dangers of concussions are receiving more attention, but they often see overreactions from parents alarmed by high-profile cases.

headline.seo: Concussion Fears Lead to Growth in Specialized Clinics for Young Athletes
headline.main: A New Way to Care for Young Brains
headline.print_headline: A New Way to Care for Young Brains
